benchmark_details.name: EDA Corpus: A Large Language Model Dataset for Enhanced Interaction with OpenROAD
benchmark_details.overview: EDA Corpus is a curated dataset for physical design automation tasks, specifically designed for training Large Language Models (LLMs) in the context of the OpenROAD EDA toolchain.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To facilitate LLM-focused research within the EDA domain and improve accessibility in chip design using OpenROAD.

data.source: Collected from OpenROAD GitHub issues, discussions, and official documentation.

methodology.calculation: Accuracy measured by evaluating the correctness of LLM-generated responses against factual answers.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better performance in generating correct answers and scripts.
methodology.baseline_results: ChatGPT3.5 showed poor performance while fine-tuning improved accuracy significantly.
methodology.validation: Dataset validation involved executing scripts in OpenROAD to verify correctness.
